funfacts.fact: The term hacking really just means working with code!
You dont have to know how to code! Some hackathon teams consist of sound engineers or graphic designers
Hackathons are long: Taking anywhere from a day to a weekend. Crazy!
Hackathons are a great way to tap into social circles and meet new people!
Some companies attend hackathons to hire programmers!
Twitter was born from a hackathon
PennApps at UPenn was the first student-run college hackathon; in 2015 it became the largest college hackathon, hosting over 2000 people and offering over $60k in prizes
Starting in 2012, NASA has been annually hosting the International Space Apps Challenge.
The term hackathon was first used around 1999 at Sun Microsystems to refer to programmers there writing a program for Java!
The 2013 hackathon by Saleforce.com had a payout of $1 million to the winners, billed as the largest-ever prize!
